item.title: v1.6.1
item.description:
• 添加了 "录制窗口范围" 功能
  • 修复了某些时候无法同时录制系统声音和麦克风的问题
  • 修复了 macOS 15 系统中有时会生成错误的文件扩展名
  • 请注意, v1.6.x 将是最后一个支持 macOS 12 系统的版本!
  • Added "record window area" feature
  • Fixed: Cannot record microphone while recording "System Audio"
  • Fixed: Wrong file extensions were sometimes generated on macOS 15
  • v1.6.x will be the final version that supports macOS 12!

item.title: v1.6.0
item.description:
• 进一步修复了与 macOS 12 的兼容性.
  • 这将是最后一个支持 macOS 12 系统的版本!
  • Fixed compatibility with macOS 12.
  • This will be the final version that supports macOS 12!

item.title: v1.5.9
item.description:
• 修复了某些场景下异常闪退的 Bug
  • 修复使用 QuickTime 打开 HDR 录像文件时出现兼容性警告的问题
  • Fixed: App crash after recording sometimes.
  • Fixed: Compatibility warning when opening HDR recordings with QuickTime.

item.title: v1.5.7
item.description:
• 由于 v1.5.6 更新中包含一个错误, 故此更新被撤回重发!
  • 添加了 zh-Hant 本地化翻译
  • 修复了某些时候录像文件大小为 0KB 的问题
  • 支持在录制过程中阻止 Mac 进入睡眠 (可在设置中关闭)
  • 支持录制结束后在屏幕角落显示预览气泡 (可在设置中关闭)
  • Update v1.5.6 contained a bug so it's being withdrawn!
  • Fixed the recording failure issue since v1.5.5 (file size is 0KB)
  • Added: zh-Hant localization
  • Added: Prevent Mac from sleeping during recording (can be disabled)
  • Added: Show preview in corner after recording (can be disabled)

item.title: v1.5.5
item.description:
• 修复了无法从多通道音频输入设备录制声音的问题.
  • 修复了录制移动设备画面时迷你控制器显示不正常的问题.
  • Fixed crash when recording from multi-channel audio input devices.
  • Fixed the appearance of the mini recording controller.

item.title: v1.5.4
item.description:
• 修复了与 macOS 12 的兼容性以及一些 UI 问题.
  • 允许用户从程序坞和菜单栏中同时隐藏 QuickRecorder, 并使用快捷键呼出面板.
  • 当将 QuickRecorder 从程序坞隐藏后, App 启动时将不会自动弹出主面板.
  • Fixed compatibility with macOS 12 and fixed some UI issues.
  • Allows users to hide QuickRecorder from both Dock and Menu Bar.
  • If QuickRecorder isn't on the Dock, the main panel will not open after launching.

item.title: v1.5.3
item.description:
• 修复了退出视频修剪器后声音仍然在后台继续播放的bug.
  • Fixed: Sound continued to play in the background after exiting the video trimmer.

item.title: v1.5.2
item.description:
• 修复了从 AirPods 麦克风录制声音时会被加速的问题.
  • 启用"将麦克风录制到主音轨"后, 当仅录制音频+麦克风时会自动导出单轨文件.
  • Fixed: Audio is accelerated when recording from AirPods microphone.
  • By enabling "Record Microphone to Main Track", a single track copy of the audio file will be generated when recording "Audio Only + Mic".

item.title: v1.5.0
item.description:
• 重新设计了偏好设置窗口的样式.
  • 修复了颜色选择器工作不正常的问题.
  • 修复了多屏场景下菜单栏图标在非活动屏幕上异常高亮的问题.
  • Redesigned the preferences view.
  • Fixed: Color picker not working properly.
  • Fixed: Menu bar icons not auto greyed out on inactive screens.

item.title: v1.4.9
item.description:
• 修复了迷你控制器模式下, 相机选择弹窗异常消失的 bug
  • Fixed: Camera menu automatically closes in mini controller mode.

item.title: v1.4.8
item.description:
• 支持通过 AppleScript 调用各种录制功能.
  • 修复了一些已知的问题.
  • Added AppleScript support for QuickRecorder.
  • Fixed some known issues.

item.title: v1.4.7
item.description:
• 支持在其他 App 处于全屏模式时框选录制区域
  • 添加了新的"迷你控制器"模式, 可以减少菜单栏空间占用
  • Support selecting the recording area on the top of full-screen apps.
  • Added new "Mini Controller" mode to save menu bar space.

item.title: v1.4.6
item.description:
• 当检测到用户所选的输出目录不存在时, 自动创建指定文件夹
  • Automatically create the output directory if it does not exist.

item.title: v1.4.5
item.description:
• 修复了仅录制系统音频时, 即使没有启用麦克风也会录制麦克风音频的问题
  • Fixed: When recording system audio, microphone is recorded even if it is not enabled

item.title: v1.4.4
item.description:
• 修复了录制移动设备结束后, 点击 Dock 图标无法唤起主面板的bug
  • Fixed: Dock icon not working after recording a mobile device

item.title: v1.4.3
item.description:
• 修复了部分 UI 控件在非 HiDPi 显示器上抽搐的问题
  • 允许在仅录制音频的情况下暂停录制
  • Fixed: Some UI elements may shake at certain resolutions
  • Allows pausing recording while recording system audio

item.title: v1.4.2
item.description:
• 内置的摄像头悬浮窗现在可以显示在全屏应用上层
  • Camera overlay can displayed on top of full-screen applications.

item.title: v1.4.1
item.description:
• 允许用户在"仅录音"的情况下同时录制系统声音和麦克风
  • 添加了新的".qma"文件容器格式用于保存多轨录音
  • 添加了麦克风选择功能, 可以从指定麦克风录制声音
  • Allow users to record both system sound and microphone.
  • Added new ".qma" file format for saving multi-track recordings.
  • Added new "microphone selection" feature.

item.title: v1.4.0
item.description:
对于近期由于证书过期和适配 macOS 15 过程中产生的 bug 跟大家说声抱歉
  • 修复了暂停录制时麦克风输入没有被暂停的问题
  • 修复了启用"降低麦克风串扰"时麦克风变成单声道的问题
Sorry about created tons of bugs when adapt my app for macOS 15
  • Fixed: Microphone input cannot be paused
  • Fixed: Microphone becomes mono when ANC is enabled

item.title: v1.3.9
item.description:
对于近期由于证书过期和适配 macOS 15 过程中产生的 bug 跟大家说声抱歉
  • 修复了关闭"录制应用声音"后无法单独录制系统音频的问题
  • 更新了不同画质的码率估算方法
Sorry about created tons of bugs when adapt my app for macOS 15
  • Fixed: Cannot record system audio alone after turning off "App's Audio"
  • Updated the bitrate estimation method for different output qualities

item.title: v1.3.8
item.description:
• 修复了音频录制异常和视频画面偏色的问题
  • 修复了某些情况下暂停录制可能导致文件保存失败的问题
  • 修复了低分辨率录制的时候码率偏低导致画面模糊的问题
  • 对于近期由于证书过期和适配 macOS 15 过程中产生的 bug 跟大家说声抱歉
  • Fixed: Distorted audio and color cast of video output
  • Fixed: Pausing recording sometimes corrupts output file
  • Fixed: Blurry video when recording at low resolution
  • Sorry about created tons of bugs when adapt my app for macOS 15

item.title: v1.3.7
item.description:
• 修复了 "屏幕区域录制" 功能崩溃闪退的问题
  • 添加了录制倒计时指示器, 可以随时中断取消
  • Fixed: Crash when recording screen area
  • Added countdown dialog, which can be interrupted at any time

item.title: v1.3.5
item.description:
• 支持在 macOS 15 中录制 HDR 内容
  • 如果系统提示需要重新授予权限, 请在偏好设置中删除并重新添加!
  • Now you can record HDR content in macOS 15
  • If macOS asks for permission again, delete it in Preferences and add it again!

item.title: v1.3.4
item.description:
• 修复了与 macOS 15 系统的兼容性
  • 更新了开发者签名
  • 如果系统提示需要重新授予权限, 请在偏好设置中删除并重新添加!
  • Fixed compatibility with macOS 15
  • Updated developer signature
  • If macOS asks for permission again, delete it in Preferences and add it again!

item.title: v1.3.3
item.description:
• 修复了"App 黑名单"无法自动保存的问题
  • 修复了"屏幕放大器"放大效果模糊的问题
  • 允许用户精确指定录制区域的大小
  • Fixed: "App Blacklist" cannot be saved
  • Fixed: "Screen Magnifier" is not sharp
  • Allow users to specify the size of the recording area

item.title: v1.3.1
item.description:
• 修复了 macOS 12/13 系统无法录制桌面壁纸的问题
  • 修复了麦克风降噪功能在 macOS 12/13 导致崩溃的问题
  • Fixed: Unable to record desktop wallpaper in macOS 12/13
  • Fixed: Enabling AEC causes crashes in macOS 12/13

item.title: v1.3.0
item.description:
• 修复了使用屏幕放大镜后下次还是自动启用的问题
  • 在改变窗口选择器过滤选项的时候自动刷新窗口列表
  • 改变了偏好设置面板的弹出方式
  • Fixed: Screen magnifier pops up even if it is not enabled
  • Auto refresh the window list when changing the filter options
  • Show preferences in a separate window

item.title: v1.2.9
item.description:
• 修复了某些情况下无法正常列出所有窗口缩略图的问题
  • 添加了警告防止用户运行多个 QuickRecorder 实例
  • Fixed: Unable to create window thumbnail list
  • Prevent users from running multiple instances of QuickRecorder

item.title: v1.2.8
item.description:
• 使用"屏幕区域"录制功能时会自动恢复上次的选择区域
  • Auto restore the last selected area when use "Screen Area" mode

item.title: v1.2.7
item.description:
• 修复了 QuickRecorder 被设为默认视频播放器的问题
  • 修复了意大利语翻译导致的界面错位
  • Fixed: QuickRecorder is no longer set as default player
  • Fixed: Italian localization

item.title: v1.2.6
item.description:
• 添加了"降低麦克风音频串扰"的选项, 开启后可以抑制外放回音
  • 修复了视频修剪器导出缓慢和丢失声音的问题
  • Added: New "Enable Acoustic Echo Cancellation" option
  • Fixed: Fixed: Video trimmer export slow and missing audio

item.title: v1.2.5
item.description:
• 修复了"录制系统声音"功能无法正常工作的bug
  • 添加了将录音输出为 MP3 格式的选项
  • 修复了视频修剪器打开文件错误 (@Pedro-Beirao)
  • 添加了意大利语本地化 (@piersandro)
  • Fixed: Cannot recording system sound
  • Added: Save recordings in MP3 format
  • Fixed: Video trimmer opening wrong file (@Pedro-Beirao)
  • Added: Italian localization (@piersandro)

item.title: v1.2.4
item.description:
• 修复了"演讲者前置"功能无法正常工作的问题
  • 修复了摄像头悬浮窗的显示逻辑
  • Fixed: Presenter Overlay not working properly
  • Fixed: Camera overlay displays incorrectly

item.title: v1.2.3
item.description:
• 修复了使用屏幕区域录制功能后 CPU 占用率异常升高的问题
  • 修复了屏幕区域选择器转移到另一个屏幕上后录制错位的问题
  • 修复了某些录制模式下, 菜单栏控制器样式错误的问题
  • 添加了开始录制一段时间后定时停止录制的功能
  • 添加了可以将麦克风声音合并入主音轨的功能
  • Fixed: High CPU usage after using the screen area recording
  • Fixed: Area selector got wrong position after moving to another screen
  • Fixed: Incorrect menu bar controller style in some recording modes
  • Added the ability to stop recording at a scheduled time
  • Added the ability to merge microphone sounds into the main audio track

item.title: v1.2.2
item.description:
• 修复了即使不设置显示菜单栏图标, 菜单栏也会出现空白图标的bug
  • Fixed an issue where a blank icon appears in menubar

item.title: v1.2.1
item.description:
• 修复了使用快捷键开始录制后, 菜单栏指示器不显示的问题
  • 修正部分 UI 文本以及部分控件在英文环境下显示异常的问题
  • 现在可以选择将 QuickRecorder 图标显示在 Dock 或菜单栏
  • Fixed: Indicator does not display when using hotkeys to start recording
  • Fixed: Some UI string are not displayed properly in English environment
  • You can now choose to display the App icon in the Dock or menu bar

item.title: v1.2.0
item.description:
• 修复了"屏幕区域选择器"在多屏场景下超出边界的问题
  • 修复了多屏场景下部分窗口出现在错误的屏幕上的问题
  • 现在"屏幕区域选择器"可随鼠标自动在多个屏幕间切换
  • 为 "窗口选择器" 和 "应用程序选择器" 添加了多屏支持
  • Fixed: Area Selector could go out of bounds when using multiple monitors
  • Fixed: Some window positions shifted when using multiple monitors
  • The "Area Selector" can auto-switch between screens following the mouse
  • Added multi-screen support for "Window Selector" and "App Selector"

item.title: v1.1.8
item.description:
• 修复了"应用程序"录制模式下, 录不到摄像头画面的问题
  • 修复某些情况下"区域录制"录制的不是所选显示器的问题
  • 修复"视频修剪器"在 macOS 12 系统中工作不正常的问题
  • 允许用户在录屏的同时以画中画形式展示 iPhone/iPad 画面
  • Fixed: camera overlayer could not be recorded when recording applications
  • Fixed: when recording screen area, the wrong monitor may be recorded
  • Fixed: the "Video Trimmer" not working properly in macOS 12 Monterey
  • Now you can show iPhone/iPad in picture-in-picture while recording a Mac

item.title: v1.1.7
item.description:
• 当菜单栏中的录制指示器因空间不足被隐藏时, 会自动转变为浮动窗口
  • 修复了在非 Retina 显示器上 UI 抖动和 macOS 12 上显示错位的问题
  • 修复了 "屏幕区域录制" 模式下, 无法隐藏自身窗口的问题
  • 修复了一些界面文本中的错字漏字
  • If the menubar item cannot be displayed, it will become a floating window
  • Fixed UI jitter on non-Retina displays and UI misalignment on macOS 12
  • Fixed "Exclude QuickRecorder itself" not working in "Screen Area" mode
  • Fixed some typos and omissions in some UI string

item.title: v1.1.6
item.description:
• 移除了不适合普通用户使用的 "像素格式" 选项
  • 新增了透明度捕捉, 可在输出中包含 Alpha 通道
  • 为 "屏幕区域录制" 添加了快捷键选项
  • Removed "Pixel Format" option not suitable for general users
  • Added Alpha support to include Alpha channel in output video
  • Added hotkey option for "Record Screen Area"

item.title: v1.1.5
item.description:
• 修复了停止录制后摄像头叠层不自动关闭的问题
  • 修复了摄像头叠层最小尺寸没有限制的问题
  • Fixed camera overlay not closing after stopping recording
  • Fixed the camera overlay minimum size limit not working
